description: Product description Experience Soothing Relief with our LKH Rubber Hot Water Bottle Our 0.5-liter hot water bottle is designed to provide comfort and pain relief for all kinds of aches and discomforts. Whether you're dealing with period pain, back pain, or simply looking for a cozy companion on a chilly day, our hot water bottle has got you covered. Quality and Safety Made from high-quality rubber material, our hot water bottle ensures durability and safety. The secure and heat-resistant plug guarantees a leak-proof seal, giving you peace of mind while you enjoy its warmth. The wide mouth hole makes filling the bottle easy and convenient. Stay Warm and Comfortable The non-slip stripe on the bottle provides extra security, ensuring it stays in place wherever you need it. Its versatile design allows you to wrap it around your body for maximum comfort and warmth. Reliable Pain Relief Whether you're experiencing muscle aches, menstrual cramps, or simply need to warm up, our hot water bottle is your reliable companion for soothing relief. Get your LKH Rubber Hot Water Bottle today and experience the comfort and warmth you deserve! Indications Pain relief, Muscle recovery
